00031 /* Object */

00033 Object::Object()
00034 {
00035     name = "";
00036     mesh = NULL;
00037     tfm = transform_identity();
00038     visibility = ~0;
00039     pass_id = 0;
00040 }
00041 
00042 Object::~Object()
00043 {
00044 }
00045 
00046 void Object::compute_bounds()
00047 {
00048     bounds = mesh->bounds.transformed(&tfm);
00049 }
00050 
00051 void Object::apply_transform()
00052 {
00053     if(!mesh || tfm == transform_identity())
00054         return;
00055     
00056     for(size_t i = 0; i < mesh->verts.size(); i++)
00057         mesh->verts[i] = transform_point(&tfm, mesh->verts[i]);
00058 
00059     Attribute *attr_fN = mesh->attributes.find(Attribute::STD_FACE_NORMAL);
00060     Attribute *attr_vN = mesh->attributes.find(Attribute::STD_VERTEX_NORMAL);
00061 
00062     Transform ntfm = transform_transpose(transform_inverse(tfm));
00063 
00064     /* we keep normals pointing in same direction on negative scale, notify
00065        mesh about this in it (re)calculates normals */
00066     if(transform_negative_scale(tfm))
00067         mesh->transform_negative_scaled = true;
00068 
00069     if(attr_fN) {
00070         float3 *fN = attr_fN->data_float3();
00071 
00072         for(size_t i = 0; i < mesh->triangles.size(); i++)
00073             fN[i] = transform_direction(&ntfm, fN[i]);
00074     }
00075 
00076     if(attr_vN) {
00077         float3 *vN = attr_vN->data_float3();
00078 
00079         for(size_t i = 0; i < mesh->verts.size(); i++)
00080             vN[i] = transform_direction(&ntfm, vN[i]);
00081     }
00082 
00083     if(bounds.valid()) {
00084         mesh->compute_bounds();
00085         compute_bounds();
00086     }
00087     
00088     tfm = transform_identity();
00089 }
00090 
00091 void Object::tag_update(Scene *scene)
00092 {
00093     if(mesh) {
00094         if(mesh->transform_applied)
00095             mesh->need_update = true;
00096 
00097         foreach(uint sindex, mesh->used_shaders) {
00098             Shader *shader = scene->shaders[sindex];
00099 
00100             if(shader->sample_as_light && shader->has_surface_emission)
00101                 scene->light_manager->need_update = true;
00102         }
00103     }
00104 
00105     scene->mesh_manager->need_update = true;
00106     scene->object_manager->need_update = true;
00107 }

00112 {
00113     need_update = true;
00114 }

00120 void ObjectManager::device_update_transforms(Device *device, DeviceScene *dscene, Scene *scene, Progress& progress)
00121 {
00122     float4 *objects = dscene->objects.resize(OBJECT_SIZE*scene->objects.size());
00123     int i = 0;
00124     map<Mesh*, float> surface_area_map;
00125 
00126     foreach(Object *ob, scene->objects) {
00127         Mesh *mesh = ob->mesh;
00128 
00129         /* compute transformations */
00130         Transform tfm = ob->tfm;
00131         Transform itfm = transform_inverse(tfm);
00132         Transform ntfm = transform_transpose(itfm);
00133 
00134         /* compute surface area. for uniform scale we can do avoid the many
00135            transform calls and share computation for instances */
00136         /* todo: correct for displacement, and move to a better place */
00137         float uniform_scale;
00138         float surface_area = 0.0f;
00139         float pass_id = ob->pass_id;
00140         
00141         if(transform_uniform_scale(tfm, uniform_scale)) {
00142             map<Mesh*, float>::iterator it = surface_area_map.find(mesh);
00143 
00144             if(it == surface_area_map.end()) {
00145                 foreach(Mesh::Triangle& t, mesh->triangles) {
00146                     float3 p1 = mesh->verts[t.v[0]];
00147                     float3 p2 = mesh->verts[t.v[1]];
00148                     float3 p3 = mesh->verts[t.v[2]];
00149 
00150                     surface_area += triangle_area(p1, p2, p3);
00151                 }
00152 
00153                 surface_area_map[mesh] = surface_area;
00154             }
00155             else
00156                 surface_area = it->second;
00157 
00158             surface_area *= uniform_scale;
00159         }
00160         else {
00161             foreach(Mesh::Triangle& t, mesh->triangles) {
00162                 float3 p1 = transform_point(&tfm, mesh->verts[t.v[0]]);
00163                 float3 p2 = transform_point(&tfm, mesh->verts[t.v[1]]);
00164                 float3 p3 = transform_point(&tfm, mesh->verts[t.v[2]]);
00165 
00166                 surface_area += triangle_area(p1, p2, p3);
00167             }
00168         }
00169 
00170         /* pack in texture */
00171         int offset = i*OBJECT_SIZE;
00172 
00173         memcpy(&objects[offset], &tfm, sizeof(float4)*4);
00174         memcpy(&objects[offset+4], &itfm, sizeof(float4)*4);
00175         memcpy(&objects[offset+8], &ntfm, sizeof(float4)*4);
00176         objects[offset+12] = make_float4(surface_area, pass_id, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00177 
00178         i++;
00179 
00180         if(progress.get_cancel()) return;
00181     }
00182 
00183     device->tex_alloc("__objects", dscene->objects);
00184 }
00185 
00186 void ObjectManager::device_update(Device *device, DeviceScene *dscene, Scene *scene, Progress& progress)
00187 {
00188     if(!need_update)
00189         return;
00190     
00191     device_free(device, dscene);
00192 
00193     if(scene->objects.size() == 0)
00194         return;
00195 
00196     /* set object transform matrices, before applying static transforms */
00197     progress.set_status("Updating Objects", "Copying Transformations to device");
00198     device_update_transforms(device, dscene, scene, progress);
00199 
00200     if(progress.get_cancel()) return;
00201 
00202     /* prepare for static BVH building */
00203     /* todo: do before to support getting object level coords? */
00204     if(scene->params.bvh_type == SceneParams::BVH_STATIC) {
00205         progress.set_status("Updating Objects", "Applying Static Transformations");
00206         apply_static_transforms(scene, progress);
00207     }
00208 
00209     if(progress.get_cancel()) return;
00210 
00211     need_update = false;
00212 }
00213 
00214 void ObjectManager::device_free(Device *device, DeviceScene *dscene)
00215 {
00216     device->tex_free(dscene->objects);
00217     dscene->objects.clear();
00218 }
00219 
00220 void ObjectManager::apply_static_transforms(Scene *scene, Progress& progress)
00221 {
00222     /* todo: normals and displacement should be done before applying transform! */
00223     /* todo: create objects/meshes in right order! */
00224 
00225     /* counter mesh users */
00226     map<Mesh*, int> mesh_users;
00227 
00228     foreach(Object *object, scene->objects) {
00229         map<Mesh*, int>::iterator it = mesh_users.find(object->mesh);
00230 
00231         if(it == mesh_users.end())
00232             mesh_users[object->mesh] = 1;
00233         else
00234             it->second++;
00235     }
00236 
00237     if(progress.get_cancel()) return;
00238 
00239     /* apply transforms for objects with single user meshes */
00240     foreach(Object *object, scene->objects) {
00241         if(mesh_users[object->mesh] == 1) {
00242             if(!object->mesh->transform_applied) {
00243                 object->apply_transform();
00244                 object->mesh->transform_applied = true;
00245             }
00246 
00247             if(progress.get_cancel()) return;
00248         }
00249     }
00250 }
00251 
00252 void ObjectManager::tag_update(Scene *scene)
00253 {
00254     need_update = true;
00255     scene->mesh_manager->need_update = true;
00256     scene->light_manager->need_update = true;
00257 }
